name: puppetry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the skill or activity of making puppets or entertaining people with puppets (= toys in the shape of people or animals, moved with strings or by someone's hand inside): traditional puppetry and mask-making
More examplesFewer examplesThis is a great opportunity to learn animation, puppetry and TV production skills.You can see everything at this little theater, from puppetry to African dance.She headed for Japan to study the ancient art of Bunraku puppetry.He fills his time with his puppetry and many social activities, such as the Cine Club.
